DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the safety and effectiveness of two approved drugs in the treatment of pain following dental surgery.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Two Approved Drugs in the Treatment of Postoperative Dental Pain (0966-183)
DOC.detailed_description: The duration of treatment is 24 hours.
DOC.criteria: Impaction of a molar tooth requiring removal Any known allergy to the study drugs
